name: de_Dustballs
description:
A simple game where you control a robot vacuum and suck up dustballs in an apartment livingroom.

3d models by Kenny (https://www.kenney.nl/assets)

Music by Mylar Melodies licensed through Youtube's Audio Library (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz0l5LJhNQkktxKWcGUtWxg)
